title: A Share in their tomorrow
brief_description: How a group of British companies are assisting, by aerial surveys, the Sudan Government to open up and develop unproductive, and previously inaccessible, terrain in the Sudan. The valuable contribution of the helicopter for surveying purposes is illustrated.
